paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with pseudo-almost periodic solutions for the nonautonomous semilinear parabolic evolution equation u'(t) = A (t) u (t) + f (t, u (t)), t is an element of R. A new existence result of mild pseudo-almost periodic solutions for the equation is obtained by using Schauder's fixed point theorem. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Mild pseudo-almost periodic solutions of nonautonomous semilinear evolution equations
